website_summaries.verdict: Pricey and powerful, this cordless tool is on par with many of its corded counterparts.
cons: Only five accessories and one 1/8-inch collet included
It's a bit more expensive as well

customer_reviews.title: Better than the others
customer_reviews.text: Milwaukee quality in a dremel size but feels, sounds and works better. It's the Torque you can set it at lower speeds and it stays there where a dremel you have to set it high because you know as soon as you make contact it slows down by half.
customer_reviews.author: Richard Nelson

customer_reviews.title: not that great
customer_reviews.text: what can i say, i own and used Milwaukee my entire life, they have a lot of great products, but i am definitely not that happy with this one. the collet doesn't tighten very good, the balance on it isn't very good and it sure doesn't sound nor feel solid like all Milwaukee tools are. got the Dremel brand for a few extra and it's works solid just like my corded Dremel.
customer_reviews.author: Flyin94

customer_reviews.title: Love this item
customer_reviews.text: Love this item. I am a locksmith that I use this almost everyday. You can use all the attachments that would fit on a normal Dremel. This one seems to have more power and better battery life than the Dremel battery operated. I also have had dremels burn up this one has a built-in stop. All in all an excellent product.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas Blankenship

customer_reviews.title: Good Tool, Good Price
customer_reviews.text: I've had this tool for a little over a week and its working out great. It came as described with a battery and charger in a nice carrying case. It came a little marked but I think that was due to the velcro strap in the carrying case during shipping. The marks went away as soon as I wiped the tool down with a wet cloth. Came with 3 cutting blades, I highly recommend buying a keyless chuck. Having purchased the tool from Twin Bargins it seems to have been a great purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Jason Greenwald

customer_reviews.title: Better than dremel
customer_reviews.text: This tool is incredible. Had a dremel for over 10 years and while it did the job the Milwaukee is a thousand times better. The ability to control speed is great.
customer_reviews.author: Pentaxian

customer_reviews.title: Powerful for the size and convenient
customer_reviews.text: I'm a contractor and I mainly use this to cut off nails and screws that I can't get with a bigger grinder. It'll take most of the attachments a Dremel uses and no cord to drag around. I wouldn't use it for cutting heavier stuff but it'll handle a 16d nail easily.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: Have a Dremel wireless with built in battery not as strong and dies quickly as it ages, so far the Milwaukee is holding up well with a lot more power and the battery is changeable. Love it so far.
customer_reviews.author: ken ayotte

customer_reviews.title: Great Tool & Die Grinder
customer_reviews.text: I use this very often now as a die grinder and as a disc grinder. I’ve used it to repair and taper stainless steel machine threads with thin kerf discs and repair motor shafts and key ways. This tool has a higher RPM than any dremels I have looked at making it fantastic for using carbide tooling.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Nice little rotory tool.
customer_reviews.text: Seems like a nice little skookum choocher. Not sure if it's priced right but I am hoping that means it will last a while. It's perfect for getting in to tight spots.
customer_reviews.author: toolguy68

customer_reviews.title: Good tool- lasted 5 years
customer_reviews.text: I've had this tool for 5 years. Like many other posters here, I've generally had good experiences. After 5 years, mine gave up the ghost this weekend. The bearings seized up. I took it apart and tested it, cleaned it, etc. but the bearings are toast. Still, 5 years isn't too bad. I'm what you'd call an "advanced DIY'er." I don't run a commercial business, but I have a 100-year old house, so I do a lot of work myself. I take good care of my tools. I'm slightly disappointed that the bearings cooked on this, but I don't see a better cordless tool on the market, so I'll likely replace it with the same tool.
customer_reviews.author: D. J. Smith

customer_reviews.title: I would buy again .
customer_reviews.text: Great tool use a lot . better then other brands .But I still burn out about 1 a year . But good tool .
customer_reviews.author: ronald harriss

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very nice to use and battery life is good for engraving.
customer_reviews.author: denise larson

customer_reviews.title: Used like new
customer_reviews.text: Got the used like new. Every thing looked brand new except the box had been opened and taped back up. Works great, so much better than my old dremmel that i smoked a few weeks ago, ill never buy a dremmel again. This milwaukee has more power and doesn't get hot at all, used it at mid power for 15 min with a 2 ma battery and used half the battery. This is my first milwaukee cordless tool and i wont hesitate to get more.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Little Helper!
customer_reviews.text: The Rotary tool works great and had already helped me in my home-renovating projects a lot. Sometimes it's automatically stops as in reaction for the overheating, which is normal. It comes back to working condition after some half-a-minute wait time.
customer_reviews.author: RoyLegrand

customer_reviews.title: This is a great product! My advice is to buy a second ...
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product! My advice is to buy a second battery, it does burn through the battery pretty quick.
customer_reviews.author: C158

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Excellent and versatile tool. My only wish is that the batteries lasted a little longer.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: great versatile unit
customer_reviews.text: Great versatile unit. Very happy with it for auto and truck wiring and electronics soldering.
customer_reviews.author: JOHN F. BORNEMANN

customer_reviews.title: Top notch
customer_reviews.text: This is a very good rotary tool. It works better than the similar tools I have owned that were made by different companies. I would recommend it to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Rambler25

customer_reviews.title: I needed a cordless dremel. This way exceeds what ...
customer_reviews.text: I needed a cordless dremel. This way exceeds what I thought I might get power wise. The battery charges fully in 30 minutes half charge in 15. I do cut some tugh materials and it gets the job done. I have two dremel type corded tools. Tool lenght of the milwaukee is about a third longer than those because of battery this may bother some people who would use this for engraving.
customer_reviews.author: DB

customer_reviews.title: I love this tool so far
customer_reviews.text: I love this tool so far.I use it a lot.I am very impressed with all of the milwaukee tools i have bought so far.I especially like the 12 and 18 volt cordless tools.I hate using extension cords.I wish i had gone cordless years ago.
customer_reviews.author: Ken H.

customer_reviews.title: Quality rotary tool.
customer_reviews.text: Great tool. The shaft is solid with no play. Milwaukee quality all the way.
customer_reviews.author: jwb

customer_reviews.title: Smooth and Powerful
customer_reviews.text: I prefer this tool by far over my dremel. Seems more powerful with less vibration. As a bonus It uses the same batteries as my other Milwaukee M12 tools.
customer_reviews.author: MetalMan

customer_reviews.title: No good product
customer_reviews.text: I did buy january 5 two time of used and power bottom doesnt work today it february 13
customer_reviews.author: Ricky

customer_reviews.title: Junk
customer_reviews.text: Broken the switch is stuck in the on position and it runs wide open
customer_reviews.author: chad roy wotring

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great I've used for many different applications ,big time saver .
customer_reviews.author: jason

customer_reviews.title: Great tool, I use it on a regular basis ...
customer_reviews.text: Great tool,I use it on a regular basis with no problems!
customer_reviews.author: marco i.

customer_reviews.title: Works like all of their other products.  Good to go.
customer_reviews.text: Works like all of their other products. Good to go.
customer_reviews.author: bdschuess

customer_reviews.title: What a great tool. It puts Dremels to shame
customer_reviews.text: What a great tool. It puts Dremels to shame. The tool is hefty and very powerful by comparison. Capable of fine detail work in addition to having enough moxie to eat through bolts with ease. Compatible with most Dremel accessories.
customer_reviews.author: Gerald Dillinger

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Best addition to my Milwaukee set yet. Best price I found anywhere!
customer_reviews.author: Kyle W.

customer_reviews.title: Awsome tool to have if you work in a field ...
customer_reviews.text: Awsome tool to have if you work in a field that u need it. Sure beats walking the job site with a corded rotary tool and 50 foot extention cord and not be able to find power.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Nice addition to my other Milwaukee M12 tools
customer_reviews.text: Nice addition to my other Milwaukee M12 tools. Light weight and powerful. The batteries last a long time, lot's of torque, and excepts standard rotary accessories.
customer_reviews.author: SoCalVet

customer_reviews.title: Strong Tool
customer_reviews.text: This is a powerful tool. I don't need a corded model now.
customer_reviews.author: DavidK

customer_reviews.title: Great tool. I use it to trim my dogs ...
customer_reviews.text: Great tool. I use it to trim my dogs nails( they are black in color & I can't see the wick). Works easley and well balanced. Another high quality tool.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Hansen

customer_reviews.title: Good tool.
customer_reviews.text: Handy tool for light duty work. It has as much powers as other corded models. An extra battery would be handy.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good all around tool
customer_reviews.text: I have had this for a few months now and have used it for various jobs around the house. It performs well but is a little noisy compared to other ones I have used in the past. The battery life is great and most Dremel tool attachments fit this as well. I recommend this product especially if you have any other m12 tools.
customer_reviews.author: nixmak

customer_reviews.title: Must have tool for diy and the like.
customer_reviews.text: I looked everywhere for this tool HD didn't have it anymore only Amazon and other stores. I love the versatility of the tool gets in tight spots and really does a great job I bought this with a big box of bits for it and it works great. Repaired a cracked radiator with it quite impressed with it. (Cleaning and prepping then adding epoxy to the crack)
customer_reviews.author: Jpena325

customer_reviews.title: Milwaukee 12v rotary tool
customer_reviews.text: I have a dremel, but I actually like this better. I cut off many bails, from a bad fence repair job of my next Dorris neighbor who let nails sticking through the fence. It did a grat job. Be advised wear safety glasses and Itbis normal for cutting wheels to wear aware when cutting metal. This is normal, just plan for it. Goog tool.
customer_reviews.author: Bradford K. Bridge

customer_reviews.title: Broke after 3 months.
customer_reviews.text: Works great to cut locks at my storage facility, that has no electricity. The off on button no longer works. It is broke in the on position but still works well.
customer_reviews.author: C J

customer_reviews.title: You can't beat Milwaukee !
customer_reviews.text: When Milwaukee decides to build a tool it does it right. This is not a Dremel. Those are for home use. This is a professional rotary tool. You can't go wrong.
customer_reviews.author: WVP

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: Actually bought this for when the electricians can't dig a hole lol. Works great as an inside cutter for 3-4" pvc when you can't get a drill deep enough into it to cut past the smashed pieces of the pipe. It tears through pvc. Especially with the 4.0 battery.
customer_reviews.author: Amy Flamenco

customer_reviews.title: milwaukee m12 tools are the best!
customer_reviews.text: just received my m12 rotary tool and am very pleased, I do apt maintenance and have used my corded dremel many times mostly tweaking lock keepers on metal door frames, all of my m12 tools perform well and any problems with them are handled no questions asked by Milwaukee, just ship the tool following the instructions at the Milwaukee web site! I currently have 12 batteries and 6 chargers! flash lights, screw guns, saws, tubing cutter, mini cam, radio and more...love my m12s!!!!
customer_reviews.author: joe

customer_reviews.title: A splendid tool.
customer_reviews.text: Purchased to replace my aged Dremel 380. Works great and a good addition to my collection of M12 series Milwaukee tools.
customer_reviews.author: Hook

customer_reviews.title: WOW! An incredible rotary tool!!
customer_reviews.text: My old dremel died some months ago and I put this on my birthday list. This is one heavy-duty, hardworking tool but I wouldn't expect anything else from Milwaukee. I have small hands and it's almost too big for me but I wouldn't dream of exchanging it for anything else. I love it!!!
customer_reviews.author: Pittypaws

customer_reviews.title: happy
customer_reviews.text: Very happy so far havnt got a tool in a long time that I was happy about everything ..I tend to use my tools hard and really seams like its going to hold up looking forward to getting more tools from Milwaukee BTW I have a Milwaukee jigsaw that's 25 years + old still use it all the time
customer_reviews.author: FishGeek

customer_reviews.title: works great
customer_reviews.text: This rotary tool system works really well. I would highly recommend this and the other parts from Milwaukee to others. Enjoy
customer_reviews.author: Stuart

customer_reviews.title: Great Tool  A+ Seller
customer_reviews.text: After researching a little i decided to buy this Milwaukee Rotary Tool. I wanted a Rotary tool for odd tasks and thought the Cordless was the way to go. The Milwaukee brand lives up to its reputation with this Tool.Love it so Far.Now about The seller.I will Definitely buy from him again , and i 100% recommend them. They have a phone # to reach them.With a live person answering.Went above and beyond to resolve a small issue. A+ Thanks Overloaded Warehouse for a great shopping experience.
customer_reviews.author: K. Richmond

product_meta.title: Milwaukee Electric Tool 2460-21 Thunderbolt Jobber Length Drill, 9/32 x 4-1/4", Cobalt
product_meta.description:
Everything you need in one handy set, the Milwaukee Rotary Tool Kit includes a rotary tool, M12 red lithium battery, five cutting wheels, mandrel, wrench, 30-minute charger, and carrying case. Though compact and lightweight, the tool runs from 5,000 – 32,000 RPM and can be easily managed via a variable speed dial for fluid control. Additional features include a 1/8” collet that’s compatible with all 1/32” – 1/8” shank accessories, providing the user access to any cutting, grinding, sanding, and polishing solutions.

FROM THE MANUFACTURER
Milwaukee Electric Tool has developed a new breed of rotary tool by leveraging its heritage in straight and die grinders. The M12 Cordless LITHIUM-ION Rotary Tool utilizes a powerful 12V motor and Milwaukee's REDLITHIUM Battery technology to produce unmatched performance and increased run-time. The size and versatility of the M12 Cordless LITHIUM-ION Rotary Tool make it an indispensable tool for Maintenance Contractors, Electricians, Plumbers, Remodelers and more. The tool runs from 5,000-32,000 RPM and is managed by a variable speed dial for fluid control. The collet is completely compatible with all 1/32-inch -1/8-inch shank accessories providing the user access to thousands of cutting, grinding, sanding and polishing solutions
feature_bullets: Includes: rotary tool, battery, 5 cutting wheels, mandrel, wrench, charger, and carrying case
Collet is compatible with all 1/32” – 1/8” shank accessories
Compact and lightweight design for easy use
Powerful Motor - Unmatched performance under load
1/8-inch Collet - Compatible with all current rotary tool accessories
Variable Speed (5,000-32,000) - Up to 10-percent faster than the competition
Compact and Lightweight - Only 9.5-inch long and 1.3-pounds
Milwaukee Durability – Grinder style exhaust ports and protected front bearing deliver up to 10X the tool life
